title: Ep. 150 "Ladies Trick Too...Well Some Of Them" ft. DJ PForReal
description:
The dating game is tough, and it's even tougher when we're both fighting for the same treatment. This week DJ PForReal joins us to break down why women should pay for dates and treat men like they want to be treated...sometimes.
